\textit{Multnomah County (State + Metro + PFA)} & & & & & \\

\textit{Metro counties (State + Metro)} & & & & & \\
\quad Washington & 600,372 & $82,215 & $67,295 & 10.9\% & 10.9\% \\
\quad Clackamas & 421,401 & $80,484 & $64,627 & 10.9\% & 10.9\% \\

\quad Marion & 345,920 & $59,625 & $48,964 & 9.9\% & 9.9\% \\
\quad Yamhill & 107,722 & $63,902 & $50,842 & 9.9\% & 9.9\% \\
\quad Columbia & 52,589 & $62,257 & $49,597 & 9.9\% & 9.9\% \\
\addlinespace
\textit{Washington State counties (no income tax)} & & & & & \\
\quad Clark & 503,311 & $75,253 & $57,308 & --- & --- \\
\quad Skamania & 12,036 & $65,181 & $54,450 & --- & --- \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabular}%
}
\begin{tablenotes}[flushleft]
\small
\item \textit{Notes:} Population from 2020 Decennial Census. Median household income from ACS 2015--2019 5-year estimates. Per capita income from BEA CAINC1 (2020). Marginal tax rates shown for a single filer at the indicated income level (2021+). Oregon state income tax: 9.9\% on income above $125K. Metro Supportive Housing Services tax: 1\% on income above $125K (Multnomah, Washington, Clackamas counties). Preschool for All (PFA) tax: 1.5\% on income above $125K, rising to 3\% above $200K (Multnomah County only). Married filing jointly thresholds are $200K (Metro, PFA bracket 1) and $400K (PFA bracket 2). Washington State has no personal income tax.
\end{tablenotes}
\end{threeparttable}
\end{table}
